alert.note: Alert for Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 8:43PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln County through 930 PM MDT... At 843 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Karval, or 38 miles south of Limon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forder, Boyero and Karval. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
